forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow for the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. High 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow this evening will give way to lingering snow showers late. Low -2C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow this evening will transition to snow showers late. Low 27F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Thunder possible. High 3C. SE winds shifting to WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Thunder possible. High 39F. SE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low -1C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low 31F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. High 3C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow during the afternoon. High 39F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low 1C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Low 33F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will mix with and change to rain during the afternoon. High 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain late. High 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 41F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 32F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 39F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening with precipitation turning to a mixture of rain and snow overnight. Low around 30F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. About one inch of snow expected.
